references.paper_title: Low data drug discovery with one-shot learning
references.reason: This paper is a pioneer work to leverage metric learning to solve FSMPP problem.

references.paper_title: Few-shot graph learning for molecular property prediction
references.reason: This paper introduces meta-learning with graph neural networks, setting a foundational framework for subsequent studies.

references.paper_title: Strategies for pre-training graph neural networks
references.reason: This paper is a classic work on pre-trained molecular encoders that has been widely used in addressing FSMPP tasks.

references.paper_title: Property-aware relation networks for few-shot molecular property prediction
references.reason: This paper initially employs graph structure learning to connect similar molecules through a homogeneous context graph.

references.paper_title: Motif-based graph self-supervised learning for molecular property prediction
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale external molecular library as context to augment the limited known information.
